cx: Sesa kratafa yi kɔ kasa foforo mu
cx-dashboard-header: Nea yɛn asesa akɔ kasa foforo mu
cx-javascript: Sa dwumadi adi yi nyɛ adwuma sɛ JavaScript ɛnka ho a. JavaScript no adum, ɛnyɛ adwuma, anaa ɛnyɛ adwuma wɔ browser yi so.
cx-specialpage-enable-betafeature: [[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Content_translation|Content Translation]] yɛ adeɛ a ɛbɛtumi aboa asesa ntwerɛeɛ bi akɔ wo kasa mu ntɛm pa ara. [$1 Sɔ hwɛ!]
cx-license-agreement: Sɛ wo tua so a ɛkyerɛ sɛ w'agye [https://foundation.wikimedia.org/wiki/Terms_of_Use Terms of Use] ato mu ɛna wo asan agye atu mu sɛ w'agyae wo mmoa no nyinaa ɛwɔ [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0/ CC BY-SA 4.0 License] ɛne [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Wikipedia:Text_of_the_GNU_Free_Documentation_License GFDL 1.3] ase.
cx-desc: Ɛma no yɛ mmerɛ sɛ [[Special:ContentTranslation|wobɛsesa]] ntwerɛeɛ bi mu nsɛm
cx-publish-error-readonly: Wɔmma kwan mma wɔnntwerɛ nkɔ wiki.
cx-publish-error-title-blacklist: Wɔatwa tia asɛm a wotwerɛeɛ no mu. Mepawokyɛw fa din foforɔ ma wo kasa nsesaeɛ no.
cx-lost-session-draft: Wo mmerɛ no atwam. Wontumi nsie wo nsesaeɛ no gye sɛ wosan buem bio.
cx-lost-session-publish: Wo mmerɛ no atwam. Wontumi mfa wo kasa nsesaeɛ no nto dwa gye sɛ wosan buem bio.
cx-lost-session-dashboard: Sɛ wopɛ sɛ wodi dwuma yi a, mepawokyɛw wura mu bio.
cx-publish-summary: Nam kasa nsesaeɛ so na ɛbaaeɛ "$1"
tag-contenttranslation-description: Wɔde Emu nsɛm Kasa nsesaeɛ afidie na ɛsesaa emu nsɛm firi kasa foforɔ mu.
tag-contenttranslation-v2-description: Wɔde Emu nsɛm Kasa nsesaeɛ afidie a ɛtɔ so 2 na ɛsesaa emu nsɛm firi kasa foforɔ mu.
cx-beta-desc: Adeɛ a wode bɛsesa wo kasa akɔ wo kasa mu ntɛm pa ara. Hyɛ kasa nsesaeɛ ase firi [[Special:MyContributions|w'adwenkyerɛ nsɛm]], na fa yɛn  afidie a woayɛ ama kasa nkyerɛaseɛ a yɛde yɛ nsiesie. Mfidie no bɛwɔ hɔ ama kasa pɔtee bi.
cx-entrypoint-title: Sesa saa krataafa yi kasa kɔ $1
cx-entrypoint-dialog-page-doesnt-exist-y: Krataafa yi nni hɔ $1 seesei ara. {{GENDER:|wo}} pɛ sɛ wo yɛ?
cx-entrypoint-dialog-desc: Wobɛtumi aboa Wikipedia asesa krataafa yi kasa. Kasa nsesaeɛ yɛ kwan mmerɛ mmerɛ a wɔfa so yɛ nsɛm foforɔ wɔ wo kasa mu.
cx-campaign-newbytranslation-title: Fa kasa nsesaeɛ hyɛ aseɛ mmom?
cx-campaign-newbytranslation-notice: Yɛ ntwerɛeɛ foforɔ berɛ a woresesa afiri kasa fororɔ a wonim.
cx-campaign-newbytranslation-search: Hwehwɛ krataafa foforɔ sesa kasa no
cx-special-login-error: Ɛwɔ sɛ wowɔ mu na woatumi asesa kasa wɔ saa krataafa yi. [$1 Wura mu]
cx-tools-instructions-text1: {{GENDER:|Bɔ so}} kasapɛn na sesa kasa no
cx-tools-instructions-text2: {{GENDER:|Wo}} ɛho nhia sɛ wode ne nyinaa bɛka ho
cx-tools-instructions-text3: {{GENDER:|Ma}} wɔn kan ntwerɛ no sɛ nea ɛteɛ
cx-tools-instructions-text4: Afidie a wode yɛ kasa nsesaeɛ ho hia nanso {{GENDER:|wo}} bɛhia sɛ wosan bɛkan wo ntwerɛeɛ no bio ama no ayɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ.
cx-tools-instructions-text5: {{GENDER:|Fa to dwa}} wo kasa nsesaeɛ no
cx-tools-instructions-text6: Berɛ a {{GENDER:|w'ani}} agye wo mmuaeɛ no ho no, mia "{{int:cx-publish-button}}".
cx-tools-mt-reset: Pepa kasa nkyerɛaseɛ no ma no nkɔ sɛnea na ɛteɛ no.
cx-tools-mt-dont-use: Fa kasapɛn a hwee nni mu hyɛ aseɛ
cx-tools-mt-noservices:
Kasa nsesaeɛ ahodoɔ yi nni hɔ ma kasa a woayi yi.
[[mw:Special:MyLanguage/Help:Content_translation/Translating/Initial_machine_translation|Adɛn?]]
cx-source-page-selector-input-placeholde: Hwehwɛ krataafa a wobɛsesa kasa no
cx-source-page-selector-no-suggestions: Dwene asɛnti a w'ani gye ho. Wonhia sɛ woakwadare wɔ mu ansa na woayɛ kasa nsesaeɛ a ɛdi mu.
cx-selected-source-page-view-count: {{PLURAL:$1|$1 nsrahwɛ  per|$1 nsrahwɛ per|0=Wommaa ha}} nnawɔtwe yi
cx-selected-source-page-error-page-and-t: Wɔde saa ti asɛm yi adi dwuma dada wɔ [$1 $2] ma [$3 kratafa foforɔ]
cx-selected-source-page-error-page-exist: Kratafa yi [$1 wɔ hɔ dada] wɔ $2
cx-selected-source-page-error-title-in-u: Kratafa foforɔ yi ti asɛm [$1 redi dwuma]
cx-favorite-added-for-later: Wɔde aka ho ama akyire yi!
cx-favorite-added-for-later-detail: Wɔde aka ho ama akyire yi! Hwɛ adwenkyerɛ no aberɛ biara.
cx-favorite-removed: Yi firi nea wopɛ no mu!
cx-mt-abuse-error-title: Wo kasa nkyerɛaseɛ no {{PLURAL:$1|wɔ}} kasa dodoɔ $1 a wonnyɛɛ mu nsesaeɛ
cx-mt-abuse-error-text:
Wɔde kasa nkyerɛaseɛ yi ama wo sɛ ahyɛaseɛ. Hwɛ sɛ emu nsɛm no yɛ pɛpɛɛpɛ na ɛte sɛ nea ɛteɛ wo wɔ kasa mu.

Wontumi mfa wo kasa nkyerɛaseɛ no nto dwa aberɛ a wonyɛɛ nsiesie biara.
cx-captcha-dialog-error: Asɛ wo mmuaeɛ no nyɛ papa. Mepawokyɛw, yɛ bio.
cx-dashboard-sidebar-title: {{GENDER:|Help}} wohia mmoa wɔ wo kasa nkyerɛaseɛ no mu?
cx-dashboard-sidebar-information: Bebiree a ɛfa afidie yi ho
cx-suggestionlist-empty-desc: Woanhunu adwenkyerɛ biara. Wobɛtumi ahwɛ no akyire yi anaa wode yɛn nnoɔma no bɛhwehwɛ krataafa a ɛho hia (nhwehwɛmu).
cx-publishing-dialog-title: Wobɛkyerɛw afa kratafa a ɛwɔ hɔ dedaw no so anaa?
cx-publishing-dialog-sub-title: Wo nkyerɛase no bɛ popa kratafa a ɛwɔ hɔ dedaw no. Mepawokyɛw, hwɛ sɛ eho hia sɛ wobɛsesa nea ɛwɔ hɔ no.
cx-publishing-with-issues-dialog-title: Mfomso wɔ ho, yɛmfa nto dwa?
cx-publishing-with-issues-dialog-message: Wo nkyerɛase no da so wɔ mfomso. Mepawokyɛw, hwɛ sɛ w'asiesie mfomso no ansa na wode ato dwa.
cx-translation-already-in-progress-unkno: Eyi yɛ nkyerɛase a ɛrekoso a yennim dwumadifo no.
cx-draft-discard-confirmation-message: Wo gye tum sɛ wo pɛ sɛ wo pepa asa nsesaeɛ yi korakora?
cx-campaign-newarticle-notice: Seisei deɛ sɛ translating bɛ te nkratafa foforo nnyɛ den koraa! Wo pɛ sɛ wo sɔ Content Translation beta afidie no hwɛ?
cx-campaign-contributionsmenu-mytranslat: Fa kasa nsesae foforo ka ho
cx-no-target-categories: Nkyekɛmu biara nni hɔ. Dwene ho sɛ wo de bi bɛkaho na ama nteaseɛ aba atifi asɛm no so.
cx-stats-all-translations-title: Kasa nsesaeɛ ɛwɔ kasa nyinaa mu
cx-stats-published-target-source: Beaɛ a Kasa nsesaeɛ no kɔ
cx-stats-published-source-target: Beaɛ a Kasa nsesaeɛ no firi
cx-notification-first-translation: Ayekoo wɔ wo kasa nsesaeɛ mmoa a adikan ho! Hwɛ wo mmoa ne nkratafa ahodoɔ a wobɛtumi asesa akɔ kasa foforɔ mu.
cx-notification-tenth-translation: Ayekoo wo wɔ kasa nsesaeɛ a ɛtoso du ho! Wore kɔ w'anim wɔ kasa nsesaeɛ ho. Toa so yɛ adwuma pa!
cx-notification-hundredth-translation: Wei yɛ wo kasa nsesaeɛ a ɛtɔ so ɔha! W'ayɛ adeɛ paa. Wo ne afoforo nkyɛ saa anigyeɛ asɛm yi.
cx-translationlist-empty-title: Hwee nni hɔ a wo bɛ sesa akɔ kasa foforɔ mu?
cx-translationlist-empty-desc: {{GENDER:|Fi}} wo kasa nsesaeɛ no ase seisei a na toa so abiri biara a wopɛ.
cx-tools-linter-generic-title: Ɔhaw kakra wɔ wo kasa nsesaeɛ no ho
cx-tools-linter-empty-title: Wo kasa nsesaeɛ no hia atifi asɛm
cx-tools-linter-page-exists-message:
Kratafa bi kura saa atifi asɛm yi $1. Sɛ wo de wo nsesaeɛ no to dwa a, ɛbɛfa dada no so.

Hwɛ sɛ ɛyɛ sɛ dada no bɛ ko afiri so, anaa sɛ to wo kasa nsesaeɛ no din foforɔ
cx-tools-linter-restart-translation-titl: Wobɛ fi kasa nsesaeɛ no ase?
cx-publish-destination-namespace-main-ex: Fa si kratafa no anan mu
cx-sx-select-section: Yi ɔfa a wopɛ sɛ wo sesa kɔ kasa foforɔ mu
cx-sx-section-selector-desc: Wobɛ susu wɔ kasa mienu no mu
cx-sx-section-selector-empty-missing-sec: Ɔfa biara nni hɔ a wobɛ sesa akɔ kasa foforɔ mu
cx-sx-content-comparator-back-to-section: San kɔ ɔfa a ɛtwa mu nyinaa so
cx-sx-content-comparator-translation-sec: Sesa ɔfa yi kɔ kasa foforɔ mu
sx-quick-tutorial-translate-button-label: Hyɛ aseɛ sesa kɔ kasa foforɔ mu
cx-sx-sentence-selector-header-title: Sesa ɔfa yi kɔ kasa foforɔ mu
cx-sx-publisher-animation-publishing-ind: Fa kasa na wo sesa kɔ mu no to dwa...
cx-sx-publisher-new-section-option-detai: Fa ɔfa foforɔ ka atwerɛsɛm no ho
cx-sx-sentence-selector-translated-segme: Nea w'asesa kɔ kasa foforɔ mu
cx-sx-article-search-input-placeholder: Hwehwɛ kratafa a wobɛsesa akɔ kasa foforɔ mu
cx-sx-translation-confirmer-translate-pr: Sesa ɔfa yi kɔ kasa foforɔ mu
sx-editor-feedback-overlay-clarification: Sua adeɛ fi wo mfomsoɔ mu
cx-campaign-mflanguagesearcher-invite: Wobɛtumi asesa kratafa yi akɔ kasa foforɔ mu. Ɛyi ni kwan a wobɛtumi de nsɛm aka ho ɛwɔ wo kasa mu.
sx-recent-translation-entrypoint-banner-: Ɛnkyɛeɛ bia na wɔsesaa saa nsɛm yi
sx-recent-translation-entrypoint-dialog-: Hwɛ beaɛ a yɛnya mmoa firi
Sesa biribi wɔ kratafa no so
sx-block-template-adaptation-card-edit-b: Hwɛ mu na yɛ nsesae no
